Strings.String: Administrator permissions are required to install Microsoft Report Viewer 2014 Runtime. Contact your administrator.
Installation of Microsoft Report Viewer 2014 Runtime requires Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 SP1 or above. Contact your application vendor.
Due to an error with Windows Installer, the installation of Microsoft Report Viewer 2014 Runtime cannot proceed.
Another instance of setup is already running. The running instance must complete before this setup can proceed.
A beta version of Microsoft Report Viewer 2014 Runtime was detected on the computer. Uninstall any previous beta versions of Microsoft Report Viewer 2014 Runtime before continuing.
A failure occurred attempting to install Microsoft Report Viewer 2014 Runtime.
